front.title: Real-time Transport Control Protocol (RTCP) in Overlay Multicast

abstract.t: The Real-time Transport Control Protocol(RTCP) is designed to operate along with Real-time Transport Protocol(RTP) in unicast, single- source multicast and any-source multicast environments. With the availability of overlay multicast, the suitability of RTCP in such an environment need to be analyzed. The applicability of the existing RTCP reporting architectures in an overlay multicast environment is investigated and the new features that may be required are discussed in this document.
